TunableList.name: VENUE_PACK_TUNING
TunableList.description: Venue tuning that is needed by UI when that venue's pack is not installed.

TunableTuple.name: data
TunableTuple.description: Venue data that is shown in the UI when this venue's pack is not installed.

TunableVariant.name: gallery_download_venue
TunableVariant.description: If tuned, the tuned venue tuning will be substituted if this venue is downloaded from the gallery by a player who is not entitled to it. The default behavior is to substitute the generic venue. This tuned venue will also determine download compatibility (for instance, only residential venues can be downloaded to owned residential venues).

TunableList.name: venue_flags
TunableList.description: Venue flags used to mark a venue with specific properties.

Tunable.name: venue_name
Tunable.description: Name that will be displayed for the venue when the pack containing that venue is not installed

Tunable.name: venue_id
Tunable.description: Reference to the venue that this data represents
